channel.title: nntdrtp 2014 – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies
channel.description: Better nannying for North Carolina starts here!

image.title: nntdrtp 2014 – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies

item.title: Meet the Presenter (Part 1)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Spread the word! This weekend is the national registration push to have people registered for a National Nanny Training Day close to them. Have you registered for National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park? You should do it now! Here’s why: You could have your ticket price refunded. Attending National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle […]
item.content:encoded:
Spread the word!

This weekend is the national registration push to have people registered for a National Nanny Training Day close to them. Have you registered for National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park? You should do it now! Here’s why:

  • You could have your ticket price refunded. Attending National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park for free? Sweet!
  • Your attendance can help unlock further stretch goals for National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park. We’ve already unlocked our first one!
  • Tickets are only $30! For an all-day professional training event consisting of multiple workshops, that’s a value!

Convinced? Head over to the National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park’s registration page and complete your registration, today!

Already Registered?

Help share the word about this and all National Nanny Training Day events.

  • Email
  • Retweet
  • Flyer
  • Facebook share
  • Mention
  • Pin
  • Instagram

Meet Ryan Fahey of Be Active Kids®

Mr. Fahey is one of the National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park trainers who will be delivering quality professional development to us. Included in the ticket price is a training from Be Active Kids® tailored specifically to the needs of the NNTD: RTP attendees.

Come learn from him, and others, at National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park!

item.title: Facelift on the Event Page ++
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Have you seen our new look? We’ve been updating the National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park page with style, color, and most importantly, information. We are pleased to announce that our two national sponsors have been added to the page: NannyBizReviews and HomeWork Solutions. But that isn’t the most exciting news. Here it is […]
item.content:encoded:
Have you seen our new look? We’ve been updating the National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park page with style, color, and most importantly, information.

We are pleased to announce that our two national sponsors have been added to the page: NannyBizReviews and HomeWork Solutions.

But that isn’t the most exciting news. Here it is (drumroll please?):
Attendance at National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park has hit the magic number necessary for us to be able to offer our first stretch goal …

FREE Professional Photography Headshots for Nanny Portfolios

!!! To say the National Nanny Training Day committee is excited is an understatement! You did it! Are you excited, too?

Imagine what else we can achieve as our attendance numbers increase! Help us spread the word and unlock further beneficial stretch goals!

Email. ReTweet. Flyer. Facebook share. Mention. Pin. Unlock.

item.title: Attend NNTD For FREE!
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: This is the second in the North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies contests for National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park. As we have said before, the North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies National Nanny Training Day Committee has been hard at work creating flyers, and you helped us with one of them. Now is […]
item.content:encoded:
This is the second in the North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies contests for National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park.

As we have said before, the North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies National Nanny Training Day Committee has been hard at work creating flyers, and you helped us with one of them. Now is the chance to release them into the wild, and, in return, earn a chance to win a free ticket to National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park!

The rules of this contest are simple: Take a selfie of yourself standing next to a National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park flyer that you have posted to a physical community bulletin board. The photo must include your face and the bulletin board with the flyer. Each photo is a chance to win, so you can post as many flyers to as many different community bulletin boards as you want within the time limit.

And to help you out, we have three different flyers for you to choose from. Post any or all that strike your fancy.

(download, download, download)

Now, it goes without saying that there must be some rules to keep everyone honest, and those are:

  • Only flyers posted to community (everyone has a fair chance to have their flyer posted) bulletin boards count.
  • Only indoor community bulletin boards. (no one wants the lovely flyer to be destroyed in the first rain storm) This type of bulletin board counts as “indoor” no matter where it is mounted, due to the doors.
  • Only post flyers to community bulletin boards after receiving the explicit permission of the business owner or manager. You are following our rules, so don’t break their rules!
  • The winner of the previous contest is ineligible to win this contest, however you can still have fun flyering and photographing your handiwork.
  • Deadline: 15th March 2014 at 11:59 pm ET to submit all your you+flyer selfies to this page. The winner will be announced on 16th March 2014, right here, on this blog.
  • Winners are selected by random drawing out of all the valid entries. Odds of winning are dependent on number of valid entries.
  • If the winner fails to provide a valid email address or fails to “purchase” a ticket to National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park using the 100%-off discount code provided by Tuesday, March 18th, 2014, then the second place winner will be awarded the winning prize, instead.
  • If a winner is selected who is already in possession of a valid ticket to National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park, that winner will receive a refund equal to the purchase price of their ticket.
  • By submitting your selfie, you allow the North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies to use your photo in marketing efforts for the 2014 National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park including, but not limited to, a photo slideshow on NCPAN.org/, a photo slideshow at the event itself, or a photo slideshow at the post-event celebratory committee meeting.

Submit Your Entries

(submission form removed due to deadline being passed)

item.title: Winner!
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Levenbook Babysitting is pleased to announce the winner of the first National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park contest! A local nanny and North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies member, Caroline Harmon. Congratulations Caroline! As Caroline has already purchased a ticket to National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park, she will receive her refund at […]
item.content:encoded:
Levenbook Babysitting is pleased to announce the winner of the first National Nanny Training  Day: Research Triangle Park contest! A local nanny and North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies member, Caroline Harmon.

Congratulations Caroline!

As Caroline has already purchased a ticket to National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park, she will receive her refund at the event in a special ceremony (there will be official website photos taken).

If you missed out on this contest, don’t worry, so long as there are sponsors, there will be contests to come!

item.title: Attend National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park for only $15!
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Introducing our first of many contests for National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park. This one is sponsored by Levenbook Babysitting. (Go like our sponsor’s Facebook page, it is the nice thing to do!) The North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies National Nanny Training Day committee has been hard at work developing flyers to promote […]
item.content:encoded:
Introducing our first of many contests for National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park. This one is sponsored by Levenbook Babysitting. (Go like our sponsor’s Facebook page, it is the nice thing to do!)

The North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies National Nanny Training Day committee has been hard at work developing flyers to promote National Nanny Training Day – you’ll see why in just a bit – but have hit writer’s block on this one:

The rules of this contest are simple: Write the words that will intrigue, entice, and convince other child care professionals in the Triangle Area to visit the National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park page (and maybe even purchase a ticket to attend).

There is one caveat. Inside of that copy, you must reference Nanny Biz Reviews, the inventor of the idea for National Nanny Training Day, by name. Entries without this important piece (part of the licensing agreement to host a local instance of National Nanny Training Day) will be automatically disqualified.

To submit your winning advertising copy, simply leave a comment with your name, a valid email address (this is how we will contact you if you have won), and your award winning words. Comments have been screened so no one else can steal your rhetoric.

Jennifer Levenbook of Levenbook Babysitting will then read each and every one of the entries and select the one that most makes her want to pull out her laptop and open her checkbook. And she will … for you!

  • This is a flash contest, so submissions must be made by 3rd March 2014 at 11:59 pm ET.
  • A winner will be announced on this blog on 4th March 2014.
  • Multiple entries per person are allowed, but each entry must contain unique content.
  • If the winner fails to provide a valid email address or fails to purchase a ticket for National Nanny Training Day with the 50% off discount code by Friday, March 7th, 2014, the second place contestant will be awarded the prize.
  • If the contest winner has already purchased a ticket to National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park, that winner will receive a refund of their ticket purchase equivalent to $15.
  • The winner consents to having their words used in a flyer to promote National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park.

What are you waiting for? Enter to win, today!

item.title: 2014 National Nanny Training Day: Research Triangle Park
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: The North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies cordially invites you to National Nanny Training Day 2014: Research Triangle Park. We have worked diligently in our short time frame to bring you a day of professional development and camaraderie that serves your unique needs. Tickets are $30 for non-members, and members receive a $5 discount (as part […]
item.content:encoded:
The North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies cordially invites you to National Nanny Training Day 2014: Research Triangle Park. We have worked diligently in our short time frame to bring you a day of professional development and camaraderie that serves your unique needs.

Tickets are $30 for non-members, and members receive a $5 discount (as part of the perks of membership).

Learn more by visiting http://NNTD.ncpan.org/.
